description: This file declares the interface for the Bmc2ComExecutor component, including functions for creating, removing, and initializing the component related to the Broadway Management Console v2.0 implementation. It contains only function prototypes and licensing information, with no executable code or class definitions.

methods.name: CreateBmc2ComeoReaderComponent
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the Bmc2 Com Executor component, taking container, owner, and reserved contexts as parameters.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderCOCreate
methods.description: Creates and initializes the Bmc2ComExecutor object with provided contexts.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderCORemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the Bmc2ComExecutor object.
